title: Learning From An Optimization Viewpoint
abstract: In this dissertation we study statistical and online learning problems from an optimization viewpoint.The dissertation is divided into two parts :
histories: Thesis supervisor : Nati Srebro Thesis Committee : David McAllester, Arkadi Nemirovski, Alexander Razborov, Nati Srebro
